name: Stars National Walker

coaches.name: Adrian Diaz
coaches.title: Head Coach
coaches.bio: Coach Adrian brings years of competitive softball experience and a passion for player development. His coaching philosophy emphasizes fundamentals, mental toughness, and preparing athletes for the next level.

coaches.name: Jeremiah Perez
coaches.title: Assistant Coach
coaches.bio: Coach Jeremiah specializes in hitting and infield development. His attention to detail and positive coaching style help players reach their full potential.

recruitingCoordinator.name: Mike Usry
recruitingCoordinator.title: Recruiting Coordinator
recruitingCoordinator.bio: Mike works with each player to navigate the college recruiting process, from initial outreach to college commitment. He maintains relationships with coaches across all divisions.

description: Stars National Walker is an elite 18U travel softball team based in Atlanta, GA. We compete in top-tier national tournaments and are dedicated to player development and college placement.
